name: Avoid PLI Programs with a very low comment/code ratio (PL1)
description:
This rule searches for all the PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) having a very low comment/code ratio. PLI programs should have at least a ratio comment/code > X %
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) having a very low comment/code ratio. 

It provides following information: 
-  PLI  programs full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
remediation: Document your source code in order to keep a  satisfactory comment/code ratio.
